title: Mandevilla & Dipladenia Care || Outdoor & Indoor Care of Mandevilla & What's The Difference?

subtasks: Identifying and describing Diplodinia and Mandevilla plants.
Discussing the growing conditions (sunlight, watering, fertilizing) for the plants.

Advising on overwintering and cold hardiness of the plants.
